title: Anime 80-nichikan Sekai Isshuu (Around the World with Willy Fog)
synopsis: Willy Fog accepts a bet from members of the Reform Club that he can make it around the world in 80 days. His plan, however, does not include being stopped by unknown enemies.
characters: ['Fog, Willy', 'Rigodon', 'Princess Romy', 'Chico', 'Inspector Dix', 'Commissioner Rowan', 'Railroad corporation president', 'Reporter Ralf', 'Transfer', 'Mr. Sullivan']
voices: ['Ginga, Banjou', 'Tomiyama, Kei', 'Takahashi, Miki', 'Nozawa, Masako', 'Nagai, Ichiro', 'Nishimura, Tomomichi', 'Shioya, Kouzou', 'Tatsuta, Naoki', 'Chiba, Shigeru', 'Genda, Tesshou']
